body: Really love this, the art is gorgeous and so are the girls. Love that the girls are Greek Mythology themed, it makes them very exotic(my fave one for now is the arachne girl with six arms). Hope this will be in English and also hope there's going to be a chapter 3 and so on. A Hydra themed girl would be so cool, her having 2-3 heads for example and maybe also having 2-3 cocks.
